definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao
to drop anchor/to break down (of a car etc)
hawsehole (small hole for anchor cable or hawser in the side of ship)

sentences.english: Anchor wires should have a Spelter type socket at anchor side.
sentences.chinese: 拋錨繩靠錨的一端應使用鋅壓頭。

sentences.english: You can read about anchors. And all about ants.
sentences.chinese: 你可以讀到船錨，還有關於螞蟻的一切。

sentences.english: The ships are anchored in the harbour, safe from the typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 船隻已在港內下了錨，不會受到颱風的威脅。

sentences.english: Then, you’d run a synthetic rope between the anchors and the BPP.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你在兩個錨和BPP之間進行人工繩連接。

sentences.english: Anchor Text and corresponding URL will be provided and must be used when commenting.
sentences.chinese: 錨文本和相應的網址將提供和評論時必須使用。

sentences.english: You have to add simple spinnable context near anchor links. (Important!
sentences.chinese: 你必須添加簡單附近錨鏈接可紡性上下文。

sentences.english: Design to grant easy stowing of anchor and smooth operation on deck.
sentences.chinese: 設計應保證錨易於放置和錨鏈在甲板上光滑運行。

sentences.english: I see myimmolation forgotten like those old anchors.
sentences.chinese: 我看見了自己的遺忘，似古先的錨。

sentences.english: We'd better ride at anchor in the harbor as it is so stormy.
sentences.chinese: 風暴挺猛，我們最好將船錨在港裏。

sentences.english: The anchor was raised and the ship pulled out.
Anchors must be moved ahead periodically as the barge progresses along the route.
sentences.chinese: 隨船沿線路向前運動，必須不斷地使船錨向前移動。

sentences.english: Hot spot, anchored in the deeper layers of the earth, provide the measuring instruments needed to resolve the question.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是，在地球深層的錨作爲測量儀可解決該難題。

sentences.english: In the lower left-hand corner, however, there's an anchor – and a dinner bell.
sentences.chinese: 在畫的左下角竟然畫了一隻錨和一隻喫飯鍾。

sentences.english: It has a simple heading, along with anchor text.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個簡單標題，含有鏈接錨文本。

sentences.english: The anchorage design of cable-crane is applied extensively in bridge construction.
sentences.chinese: 纜索吊機錨碇設計在橋樑施工中應用十分廣泛。

sentences.english: He was quite popular among the younger set in Anchorhead.
sentences.chinese: 他在錨頭鎮年輕人中間的人氣相當高。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag
a saw/to cut with a saw
